author: Reuters Editorial
title: Miner Nevsun says rejects Lundin, Euro Sun proposal as too low
text:
VANCOUVER, May 8 (Reuters) - Nevsun Resources said on Tuesday that its board of directors had unanimously rejected a non-binding, unsolicited takeover proposal from Lundin Mining Corp and Euro Sun Mining, saying it was too low and had a “problematic structure”.
Nevsun said in a statement that the rejection followed an extensive engagement with fellow Canadian-based miner Lundin over several months with regard to a possible transaction. (Reporting by Nicole Mordant in Vancouver Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
